title: Born to Be Sold (1981, Thriller) Lynda Carter, Harold Gould, Dean Stockwell | Movie

sources.title: Born to Be Sold (1981, Thriller) Lynda Carter, Harold Gould, Dean Stockwell | Movie
sources.description:
A social worker tries to break up a ring of crooks who buy newborn babies from teenaged mothers and sell them to couples who can't obtain them through legal adoption channels.

Original title: Born to Be Sold (1981) AKA: Baby Broker
This film has subtitles in many language options.

Director: Burt Brinckerhoff
Writers: Lynne McTaggart, Karen Harris 
Stars: Lynda Carter, Harold Gould, Philip Sterling, Dean Stockwell
Genres: Drama, Thriller, TV Movie


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:17 A woman seeks help from a social worker after being evicted and facing a difficult situation involving her children.
12:03 A teenage girl goes into labor unexpectedly, with her mother and social worker assisting in the delivery.
21:51 A teenage girl's baby is sold without her knowledge, leading to emotional turmoil and legal intervention.
24:40 Illegal private adoptions orchestrated by a slick broker exploiting vulnerable mothers and wealthy couples.
32:53 A woman seeks justice after a baby is switched at birth, leading to a series of mysterious events.
37:17 A woman navigates through the complexities of illegal baby trafficking and personal relationships.
47:08 A story of a mother fighting for her baby against a deceitful couple and corrupt practices.
58:51 A lawyer faces threats and challenges while trying to protect a young mother and her baby.
1:10:50 Drama unfolds in a courtroom as Cindy considers giving up her baby for adoption, facing pressure from various parties.
1:16:33 A teenage girl struggles with pregnancy and emotional turmoil, seeking justice and closure.
1:23:15 A couple is caught in an illegal adoption scheme, leading to their arrest during a meeting.
